dmca.title: Wiki Wiki
dmca.body:
http://www.mywikibiz.com/ordernow.html
(site from that time: http://web.archive.org/web/20060826093539/http://www.mywikibiz.com/ordernow.html)

You need to take your website down or at least radically change it.  As
it stands today, it appears to me to strongly mislead potential
customers by implying that by paying you, customers will have a better
chance of getting a good article in Wikipedia.

You are inappropriately using our trademarks in commerce, and this must
stop immediately.

You are not telling your potential customers that you have been banned
from editing Wikipedia.

This is a friendly letter, I am open to discussing the possibilities
here.  I prefer that we resolve this amicably.  But I am cc'ing our
legal counsel, Brad Patrick, to let you know that we reserve all our
rights to take legal action in the future.

--Jimbo
